last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Problem
last_episode_to_air.overview: Twilight Sparkle and friends tell a story about how Twilight had to make a difficult decision when Celestia and Luna retire and hand the throne to Twilight who must choose to either be the rightful ruler of Equestria or stay in Ponyville with her friends.

name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
original_name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
overview: "Get your muzzle out of those books and make some friends!" That's what Princess Celestia tells Twilight Sparkle. She may be the smartest unicorn in Equestria, but Twilight Sparkle gets an "incomplete" in friendship. There's more to life than learning magic, after all -- so she goes to Ponyville on a mission to make friends. There she meets five special ponies who take her on exciting adventures and teach her the most powerful magic of all ... the magic of friendship!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
The first season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on The Hub in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. The series premiered on October 10, 2010, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for E/I content and marketing of the toy line.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:

The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 2 of the series premiered on September 17, 2011, on Hub Network, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

seasons.overview:

The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 3 of the series premiered on November 10, 2012, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview:
The fourth season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on The Hub in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 4 of the series premiered on November 23, 2013, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Twilight Sparkle, Apple Jack, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash visit a village where… everypony has given up their Cutie Marks?!

episodes.name: Friendship is Magic (1)
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle, a reclusive student of Princess Celestia, is tasked with supervising a special event in Ponyville and to make five new friends in the process.

episodes.name: Friendship is Magic (2)
episodes.overview: The evil Nightmare Moon is free from her imprisonment, vowing to shroud the world in eternal night, and Princess Celestia has gone missing. Twilight and the her friends must find six magic stones called the Elements of Harmony, hidden in the mysterious Everfree Forest.

episodes.name: The Ticket Master
episodes.overview: Twilight receives two tickets from Princess Celestia to the Grand Galloping Gala. All five of her best friends want to go, but she can only choose one.

episodes.name: Applebuck Season
episodes.overview: With her big brother hurt, Applejack volunteers to harvest the apple crop in her family's orchard all by herself. However, she is too prideful and stubborn to accept any help from the other ponies.

episodes.name: Griffon the Brush-Off
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie bonds with Rainbow Dash over their shared love of pranks, but when Rainbow's old friend Gilda the Griffon visits, Pinkie Pie becomes a third wheel, and notices that Gilda has a mean streak.

episodes.name: Boast Busters
episodes.overview: A new unicorn called "The Great and Powerful" Trixie arrives in Ponyville, claiming to be the greatest magical pony in Equestria. Spike believes Twilight may be the one unicorn to put the arrogant braggart in her place, but she worries that she will lose the respect of her friends if she shows her true potential.

episodes.name: Dragonshy
episodes.overview: As a sleeping dragon's smoke begins clouding Equestria's skies, Twilight Sparkle is tasked with getting it to leave. She and all her friends head to the dragon's lair, dragging along fearful Fluttershy, who must find the courage to face the giant dragon.

episodes.name: Look Before You Sleep
episodes.overview: When a thunderstorm forces Applejack and Rarity to seek shelter in her library, they're invited by Twilight Sparkle to have a slumber party. However, their clashing personalities and preferences may make it difficult for them to get along.

episodes.name: Bridle Gossip
episodes.overview: Twilight encounters the mysterious zebra Zecora, who occasionally visits Ponyville and is rumored to be a witch. When she and her friends display a range of bizarre symptoms the next day, they begin to wonder whether Zecora put a curse on them. Applejack's little sister, Apple Bloom, ventures into the Everfree Forest to find the truth.

episodes.name: Swarm of the Century
episodes.overview: Everypony is making sure things are perfect for an upcoming visit by Princess Celestia to Ponyville, especially Twilight Sparkle, but trouble arises when a swarm of parasprites, adorable insects with ravenous appetites, invades the town.

episodes.name: Winter Wrap Up
episodes.overview: As winter comes to its scheduled end, Ponyville prepares for the annual cleanup to make way for spring. Twilight Sparkle wants to help, even without her magic (to respect Ponyville's traditions), but she may find it difficult to find her place.

episodes.name: Call of the Cutie
episodes.overview: A young pony earns their cutie mark upon discovering their special talent and life's purpose. Apple Bloom's worry about her still-missing cutie mark causes her to try to earn it before a classmate's upcoming "cute-ceañera" party.

episodes.name: Fall Weather Friends
episodes.overview: Applejack and Rainbow Dash take part in a marathon event known as the Running of the Leaves, in which Dash must compete without the use of her wings. Can they both ensure a clean race without the competition getting the better of them?

episodes.name: Suited for Success
episodes.overview: Rarity makes dresses for her friends for the upcoming Grand Galloping Gala, but they don't turn out to but what her friends expected. She strains herself catering to their demands, then learns her new dresses will be put on a fashion show.

episodes.name: Feeling Pinkie Keen
episodes.overview: Twilight learns that Pinkie Pie has an unusual ability to sense happenings in the immediate future, known around Ponyville as "Pinkie Sense." Not willing to accept these predictions are anything but a mere coincidence, Twilight sets out to find the truth behind Pinkie's power.

episodes.name: Sonic Rainboom
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash is preparing herself for an upcoming contest, with a day with the famous Wonderbolts as the grand prize, and is sure that an old move she claimed to have pulled off long ago will guarantee her a win. However, she becomes increasingly nervous that she won't succeed.

episodes.name: Stare Master
episodes.overview: Fluttershy has great experience with all kinds of animals, but it is an entirely different story when she offers to take care of Apple Bloom, Scootaloo, and Sweetie Belle for the night. Will she be able to keep them out of trouble, and what exactly is "The Stare"?

episodes.name: The Show Stoppers
episodes.overview: After entering a talent competition, the Cutie Mark Crusaders believe the event will help them discover what they are meant to do in life. They hope that winning the contest will help them get their cutie marks, if they can keep from ruining each other's work.

episodes.name: A Dog and Pony Show
episodes.overview: To create jewel-encrusted clothing at the request of a famous pony, Rarity decides to find a new lode of gems with Spike's assistance. But when a group of creatures called the Diamond Dogs abduct Rarity and force her to find gems for them, Spike and the other ponies head underground to rescue her. In the end, who will be the one that truly needs saving?

episodes.name: Green Isn't Your Color
episodes.overview: When Rarity meets a famous fashion photographer, she realizes that this is her chance to promote her newest dresses, but her idea backfires when the pony is more interested in Fluttershy, whom Rarity chose to model her dresses. Both tell Twilight they aren't happy about this but don't want the other to know, and she is faced with a dilemma of keeping their secrets.

episodes.name: Over a Barrel
episodes.overview: The ponies separate and are caught in a dispute between a western town's settler-ponies and the native buffalo herd. Both sides have claimed the land as their own, and neither side is standing down. Can they find a way to prevent the inevitable clash?

episodes.name: A Bird in the Hoof
episodes.overview: During a visit from Princess Celestia, Fluttershy sees the Equestrian royal's sick pet bird Philomena. She secrets the poor creature home and tries to take care of it, but finds that the task to be harder than it looks.

episodes.name: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
episodes.overview: Every pony with a cutie mark has a different story to tell about how they earned it. Taking a break from searching for their special talents, the Cutie Mark Crusaders decide to ask Rainbow Dash and the others about their marks, eventually discovering a surprising connection.

episodes.name: Owl's Well That Ends Well
episodes.overview: Spike meets an owl Twilight befriends to help her with their work. He soon feels threatened over the possibility that it will take his spot as the unicorn's trusted assistant. Driven by jealousy, how far will he go to make sure it doesn't happen?
episodes.production_code: Twilight Sparkle se spřátelí se sovou, což se však nelíbí Spikovi, protože sova postupně zabírá jeho místo a přebírá jeho práci. Spike vymýšlí plány, jak se otravného ptáka zbavit a dokázat Twilight, že on je nejlepší asistent.

episodes.name: Party of One
episodes.overview: After a successful birthday party for Gummy, her pet alligator, Pinkie Pie invites her friends for an "After Birthday" party the next day. However, they claim to have other errands to run, declining the invitations. Pinkie Pie grows suspicious and sets out to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: The Best Night Ever
episodes.overview: After much anticipation, Canterlot's Grand Galloping Gala has finally begun. As Twilight and her friends take part in the festivities, only one question remains: Is it everything the ponies imagined it to be?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
The first season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on The Hub in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. The series premiered on October 10, 2010, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for E/I content and marketing of the toy line.

episodes.name: The Return of Harmony (1)
episodes.overview: The peace of Equestria is threatened when Discord, a mischievous spirit of disharmony, escapes from his imprisonment in stone. Twilight and her friends must defeat him using the Elements of Harmony. If only they can find them!

episodes.name: The Return of Harmony (2)
episodes.overview: Twilight's friends have been corrupted by Discord, and all of Equestria is about to fall into total chaos. Twilight remembers about the riddle of finding the stolen Elements of Harmony. However, even after obtaining them, can she and her friends defeat their most powerful foe yet with almost all hope lost?

episodes.name: Lesson Zero
episodes.overview: Hyper-organized Twilight panics when she can’t find a lesson about friendship for her weekly letter to Princess Celestia.

episodes.name: Luna Eclipsed
episodes.overview: It's Nightmare Night and the macabre celebrations are in full swing when Luna herself shows up in Ponyville, determined to change her frightening public image.

episodes.name: Sisterhooves Social
episodes.overview: Sweetie Belle comes up with an idea to celebrate sisterly unity in an impromptu party with not much planning, and when Rarity decides not to be part of the celebration, Sweetie Belle becomes angry and disowns her as her sister.

episodes.name: The Cutie Pox
episodes.overview: Applebloom finally gets her Cutie Mark! But joy turns to panic as she gets a second, then a third, then a dozen cutie marks.

episodes.name: May the Best Pet Win!
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash holds a flying race to determine who will win the honor of being her pet.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Mare Do Well
episodes.overview: A new masked avenger is stealing Rainbow Dash's thunder as Ponyville's resident hero.

episodes.name: Sweet and Elite
episodes.overview: During a successful trip to Canterlot, Rarity has to choose between the important social connections she's made in the capitol and her uncouth Ponyville friends.

episodes.name: Secret of My Excess
episodes.overview: After Spike's birthday gifts activate his greedy dragon instincts, he undergoes an outrageous growth spirt that threatens to destroy all of Ponyville, so he must find a way to stop growing and save the inhabitants of the city.

episodes.name: Hearth's Warming Eve
episodes.overview: The six friends are honored to put on Canterlot's most important play of the season, the Hearth's Warming Eve's holiday pageant, which illustrates how Unicorns, Pegasi and Earth Ponies put aside their differences and founded Equestria.

episodes.name: Family Appreciation Day
episodes.overview: Apple Bloom does everything she can think of to stop Granny Smith from speaking to her class and causing everlasting embarrassment.

episodes.name: Baby Cakes
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie takes on the task of babysitting the Cakes' twin toddlers but is woefully unprepared for the challenge.

episodes.name: The Last Roundup
episodes.overview: The friends travel all over Equestria to track down Applejack, who has mysteriously disappeared after attending a rodeo competition in Canterlot.

episodes.name: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000
episodes.overview: The Flim Flam brothers challenge the Apples to a Cider Making Contest and the winner of the showdown gets to take Sweet Apple Acres, so with the farm in peril, the Apple ponies must come together and muster all their cider making skills.

episodes.name: Read It and Weep
episodes.overview: After mocking it as an 'egghead' pursuit, Rainbow Dash discovers the joys of reading while laid up in Ponyville Hospital. Can she finish her book before her friends discover her secret?

episodes.name: Hearts and Hooves Day
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders create a love potion to make Miss Cheerilee and Big Macintosh fall in love, but quickly regret their actions when they discover that serious side effects have set in.

episodes.name: A Friend in Deed
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie meets Cranky Doodle Donkey, she becomes flummoxed about what to do when the donkey refuses her usual offer of lifelong friendship, so she must decide what to do next about the first creature ever to do such a thing.

episodes.name: Putting Your Hoof Down
episodes.overview: When Fluttershy becomes tired of being pushed around for too long, she decides to seek some assertiveness training from self-help guru Iron Will.  With the help of her new teacher, she quickly transforms her unsure ways.

episodes.name: It's About Time
episodes.overview: When Twilight Sparkle receives a strange and vague warning about impending doom and disaster from her future self, she drives herself nearly mad in an attempt to stall a cataclysmic event, but her uncertainty makes finding answers difficult.

episodes.name: Dragon Quest
episodes.overview: Spike goes on a journey of self-discovery by joining the Great Dragon Migration. But does a rough and tumble gang of teenage dragons really hold the key to the questions Spike has about his identity?

episodes.name: Hurricane Fluttershy
episodes.overview: Fluttershy struggles to overcome her fear of public humiliation so she can help Rainbow Dash and the other pegasi create a Tornado powerful enough to lift the water required for Rainy Season up into the cloud-producing city of Cloudsdale.

episodes.name: Ponyville Confidential
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders adopt the name 'Gabby Gums' to become the gossip columnist for their school paper. They seem to have finally found something they're good at! But is it worth the pain they cause to other ponies with their hurtful stories?

episodes.name: MMMystery on the Friendship Express
episodes.overview: A cake Pinkie Pie is guarding for a contest is ruined on the way to Canterlot and an investigation begins.

episodes.name: A Canterlot Wedding (1)
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle is confused by her conflicting feelings when she finds out her brother, Shining Armor, is marrying Princess Celestia's niece, Cadance.

episodes.name: A Canterlot Wedding (2)
episodes.overview: Shining Armor and Princess Cadance are set to be married, but Twilight Sparkle has just discovered a dark secret about the bride-to-be.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview:
The second season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on Hub Network in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 2 of the series premiered on September 17, 2011, on Hub Network, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

episodes.name: The Crystal Empire (1)
episodes.overview: Northern Equestria's Crystal Empire has reappeared after being afflicted with a curse that made it vanish for 1,000 years. Princess Celestia asks Twilight Sparkle and her friends to protect the empire from disappearing again.

episodes.name: The Crystal Empire (2)
episodes.overview: After Princess Celestia commissions her to keep Crystal Empire from vanishing again, Twilight realizes that she must find the missing Crystal Heart in order to restore the empire's reputation and strength before it disappears again.

episodes.name: Too Many Pinkie Pies
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed with having to choose just one friend to spend time with, Pinkie Pie uses a magic mirror to clone herself.

episodes.name: One Bad Apple
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are crushed when Babs Seed rejects their invitation to become a fellow Crusader and instead become a bully.

episodes.name: Magic Duel
episodes.overview: Wearing a mysterious amulet, Trixie returns to Ponyville for her "unfinished business" with Twilight Sparkle.

episodes.name: Sleepless in Ponyville
episodes.overview: Over a campfire, Rainbow Dash decides to share some imaginative and spooky tales, causing Scootaloo to have frightening, vivid nightmares; Scootaloo wants to get rid of her nightmares but doesn't want the others to think she is spineless.

episodes.name: Wonderbolts Academy
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash receives an invitation to attend the Wonderbolt Academy but questions whether she is Wonderbolt material.

episodes.name: Apple Family Reunion
episodes.overview: Granny Smith agrees to let Applejack lead the Apple Family reunion but Applejack loses sight of what is truly important.

episodes.name: Spike at Your Service
episodes.overview: After Applejack saved Spike, he insists on fulfilling the Nobel Dragon Code by repaying her with excessive help around the farm.

episodes.name: Keep Calm and Flutter On
episodes.overview: Princess Celestia has decided that the rambunctious Discord needs to be tamed and commissions the ponies for the job; Fluttershy believes that Discord deserves a second chance but she faces opposition as the only one who thinks so.

episodes.name: Just for Sidekicks
episodes.overview: Spike finds himself in over his head after convincing Twilight and her friends to let him pet-sit all of their critters in exchange for a few gems.

episodes.name: Games Ponies Play
episodes.overview: In the hopes of proving that the Crystal Empire is more than worthy of being selected as the next venue for the upcoming Equestria Games, Princess Cadance commissions Twilight to work her magic with the deciding Games Inspector.

episodes.name: Magical Mystery Cure
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle wakes up one day to find that all her friends' cutie marks have been switched! Can she fix something as bad as an altered destiny?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview:
The third season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on The Hub in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 3 of the series premiered on November 10, 2012, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

episodes.name: Princess Twilight Sparkle (1)
episodes.overview: Now that she is a Princess, Twilight Sparkle has an important new role to play in the Summer Sun Celebration. But her plans are put on hold when Princess Luna and Princess Celestia go missing.

episodes.name: Princess Twilight Sparkle (2)
episodes.overview: The Everfree Forest is threatening to take over all of Equestria. In order to stop it, Princess Twilight and her friends must bring their Elements to the Tree of Harmony.

episodes.name: Castle Mane-ia
episodes.overview: When the ponies all end up in Luna and Celestia's old castle, they become convinced that it is haunted by the Pony of Shadows.

episodes.name: Daring Don't
episodes.overview: When the latest book in the Daring Do series is delayed, Rainbow Dash and her friends decide to offer their help to the book's author so that she can finish it. The writer does need help, but not in the ways they'd imagined.

episodes.name: Flight to the Finish
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders vie for the honor of carrying the Ponyville flag at the Equestria Games. Problems arise when Scootaloo becomes convinced that the best way to represent Ponyville is to fly during their routine.

episodes.name: Power Ponies
episodes.overview: When Spike and the Mane 6 end up as superheroes in a comic book world, the only way to get back home is to defeat the super-villain, The Mane-iac.

episodes.name: Bats!
episodes.overview: Vampire Fruit Bats take over Sweet Apple Acres and Applejack and her friends' efforts to get rid of them take an unexpected and frightening turn.

episodes.name: Rarity Takes Manehattan
episodes.overview: Rarity goes to Manehattan for Fashion Week and loses her sense of generosity after another designer copies her entire fashion line.

episodes.name: Pinkie Apple Pie
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie discovers that she might be related to the Apple family, she joins them on a road trip to visit a relative who can provide proof that she is their cousin.

episodes.name: Rainbow Falls
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash is headed to the Equestria Games trials with the Ponyville Relay Team, but becomes torn when she's offered the chance to join the more competitive Cloudsdale team.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Twilight is looking forward to some quality bonding time with Princess Cadance. But when a sick friend shows up needing Twilight's attention, it looks like her plans for a peaceful visit with her sister-in-law will have to be put on hold.

episodes.name: Pinkie Pride
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie finds her status as "super-duper party pony" in jeopardy when the mysterious Cheese Sandwich comes to town and offers to plan an epic birthday party for Rainbow Dash. Guest voiceover by Weird Al.

episodes.name: Simple Ways
episodes.overview: Rarity has a crush on travel writer, Trenderhoof, and plans to wow him with her ideas for the upcoming Ponyville Days Festival. But Trenderhoof soon has a crush of his own, and Rarity finds herself competing with Applejack for his attention.

episodes.name: Filli Vanilli
episodes.overview: When a member of the singing group, the Ponytones, has to drop out of an important performance, Fluttershy takes drastic measures to ensure that the show goes on.

episodes.name: Twilight Time
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are thrilled when Twilight offers to help them with their studies. Problems arise when the girls realize they can use their relationship with Twilight to increase their popularity.

episodes.name: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies
episodes.overview: When tiny, magical creatures called Breezies get into trouble while making their migration home, Fluttershy swoops in to save them. She soon finds herself tending to their every need, and her kindness may turn out to be more harmful than helpful.

episodes.name: Somepony to Watch Over Me
episodes.overview: Apple Bloom gets the chance to stay home alone for the day, but a series of unfortunate accidents causes Applejack to regret her decision. Apple Bloom must find a way to prove to her sister that she doesn't need her to constantly watch over her.

episodes.name: Maud Pie
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie's sister comes to town, the girls find her much different than Pinkie described.

episodes.name: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
episodes.overview: Sweetie Belle ruins a costume for one of Rarity's clients on purpose; Luna visits her in her dreams.

episodes.name: Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Applejack is doubtful of the Flim Flam Brothers' cure-all tonic; Granny Smith tries it and it seems to work.

episodes.name: Testing, Testing, 1, 2, 3
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash uses unconventional methods to prepare for her test to become a member of the Wonderbolts Reserves.

episodes.name: Trade Ya!
episodes.overview: When the trip to the Rainbow Falls Traders Exchange doesn't go as planned, the girls learn just how valuable their friendship really is.

guest_stars.character: Antique Chicken Stand Pony / Ancient Beast Dealer (voice)
guest_stars.name: Michael Daingerfield

episodes.name: Inspiration Manifestation
episodes.overview: Rarity loses her creativity and Spike finds a spell to help her get it back.

episodes.name: Equestria Games
episodes.overview: Spike is in charge of lighting the torch for the opening of the Equestria Games, but his nerves get the best of him.

episodes.name: Twilight's Kingdom (1)
episodes.overview: Princess Celestia chooses Discord over Princess Twilight to help track down a villain.

episodes.name: Twilight's Kingdom (2)
episodes.overview: The other princesses transfer all of their magical power to Twilight in hopes of saving Equestria.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview:
The fourth season of animated television series My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic, developed by Lauren Faust, originally aired on The Hub in the United States. The series is considered to be the fourth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, following earlier lines and television show tie-ins in the 1980s and 1990s. Season 4 of the series premiered on November 23, 2013, on The Hub, an American pay television channel partly owned by Hasbro.

The show follows a studious unicorn pony named Twilight Sparkle as her mentor Princess Celestia guides her to learn about friendship in the town of Ponyville. Twilight becomes close friends with five other ponies: Applejack, Rarity, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Pinkie Pie. Each represents a different face of friendship, and Twilight discovers herself to be a key part of the magical artifacts, the "Elements of Harmony". The ponies share adventures and help out other residents of Ponyville, while working out the troublesome moments in their own friendships.

Hasbro selected animator Lauren Faust as the creative director and executive producer for the show. Faust sought to challenge the established "girly" nature of the existing My Little Pony line, creating more in-depth characters and adventurous settings, incorporating Hasbro's suggestions for marketing of the toy line.

episodes.name: The Cutie Map (1)
episodes.overview: The Mane 6 are summoned to solve a friendship problem only to find a utopian village where everyone has given up their Cutie Marks.

episodes.name: The Cutie Map (2)
episodes.overview: The Mane 6 have had their Cutie Marks taken and must find a way to get them back. When a deep dark secret is revealed about the pony who took them, they think they may have the answer.

episodes.name: Castle Sweet Castle
episodes.overview: When her friends find out that Princess Twilight has been avoiding her new castle, they offer to make it feel more like home.

episodes.name: Bloom and Gloom
episodes.overview: Apple Bloom's anxieties about getting her Cutie Mark turn her life into a nightmare from which she may never escape.

episodes.name: Tanks for the Memories
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash can't accept the fact that Tank must hibernate for the winter and decides that the solution is to stop winter from coming.

episodes.name: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
episodes.overview: When notorious outlaw Troubleshoes Clyde returns to menace the Appleoosa rodeo, the Cutie Mark Crusaders realize that bringing him to justice might be the key to finally getting their cutie marks.

episodes.name: Make New Friends But Keep Discord
episodes.overview: After finding out that Fluttershy is taking a new friend to the Grand Galloping Gala instead of him, Discord goes to extreme lengths to show that it doesn't bother him.

episodes.name: The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash and Pinkie pie are called by the map to the ancient kingdom of Griffonstone but have conflicting ideas as to what problem they have been called to fix.

episodes.name: Slice of Life
episodes.overview: In this special 100th episode, Twilight Sparkle, Fluttershy, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie and Rarity battle a monster as the rest of Ponyville rushes to make it to a wedding on time.

episodes.name: Princess Spike
episodes.overview: When Spike is put in charge of making sure nothing disturbs Princess Twilight, the power soon goes to his head and he begins making decisions in her name.

episodes.name: Party Pooped
episodes.overview: An important friendship summit takes a disastrous turn and it's up to Pinkie Pie to save the day.

episodes.name: Amending Fences
episodes.overview: After reminiscing about her Canterlot days, Twilight realizes that she left for Ponyville without really saying goodbye to her old friends, and tries to reconnect and re-open friendships lost.

episodes.name: Do Princesses Dream of Magic Sheep?
episodes.overview: When the mysterious Tantabus escapes Princess Luna’s dreams, the Princess must find a way to stop it before it turns everypony's dreams into nightmares.

episodes.name: Canterlot Boutique
episodes.overview: Rarity's dream of owning a boutique in Canterlot finally comes true, but it comes at a price Rarity may not be willing to pay.

episodes.name: Rarity Investigates!
episodes.overview: Rarity must prove that her friend is innocent when Rainbow Dash is accused of a crime that she did not commit.

episodes.name: Made in Manehattan
episodes.overview: Applejack and Rarity are called to Manehattan to solve a friendship problem, and find themselves helping Coco Pommel with a major project in her neighborhood. The three soon discover that they've bitten off more than they can chew.

episodes.name: Brotherhooves Social
episodes.overview: When Applejack is called away and has to miss participating in the Sisterhooves Social with Apple Bloom, Big Mac decides to fill in for her.

episodes.name: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
episodes.overview: When Pip Squeak decides to run for class president, the Cutie Mark Crusaders rally around their friend, but find themselves helping their long-time nemesis, Diamond Tiara, in an unexpected way.

episodes.name: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie must try to keep an unintentionally-shared secret involving Princess Cadance and Shining Armor.

episodes.name: Hearthbreakers
episodes.overview: Applejack is excited to celebrate Hearthswarming Eve with Pinkie Pie's family but soon discovers that the Pies have very different ways of enjoying the holiday at their Rock Farm.

guest_stars.character: Maud Pie / Limestone Pie / Marble Pie (voice)
guest_stars.name: Ingrid Nilson

episodes.name: Scare Master
episodes.overview: Determined to overcome her timidity and face her fears, Fluttershy decides to participate in the scary fun of Nightmare Night with her friends.

episodes.name: What About Discord
episodes.overview: Twilight returns from a trip and is distressed to find that her friends have become close to Discord, making her wonder if Discord is up to something.

episodes.name: The Hooffields and McColts
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle and Fluttershy are called upon by the Cutie Map to settle a bitter family feud.

episodes.name: The Mane Attraction
episodes.overview: An old friend of Applejack’s has become a huge pop star, but Applejack is worried that the singer’s manager does not have her best interests at heart.

episodes.name: The Cutie Re-Mark (1)
episodes.overview: Starlight Glimmer casts a time travel spell as a new plot for revenge against Twilight Sparkle.

episodes.name: The Cutie Re-Mark (2)
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle tracks down Starlight Glimmer in the past and tries to find a way to stop her revenge plot.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Twilight Sparkle, Apple Jack, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash visit a village where… everypony has given up their Cutie Marks?!

episodes.name: The Crystalling (1)
episodes.overview: The Mane Six attend the Crystalling of Cadence and Shining Armor's new baby at the Crystal Empire; Twilight gets the chance to present Starlight with her first friendship lesson.

episodes.name: The Crystalling (2)
episodes.overview: The Mane Six scramble to save the Crystal Empire from an eternal winter; Starlight struggles after the failed reunion with her old friend.

episodes.name: The Gift of  the Maud Pie
episodes.overview: Rarity and Pinkie Pie are in Manehattan looking for an ideal location for Rarity's new store and searching for the perfect gift for Pinkie Pie's sister.

episodes.name: On Your Marks
episodes.overview: Now that they've finally received their cutie marks, the Cutie Mark Crusaders struggle with the question of what's next; the friends do not all agree on how to embrace their destinies.

episodes.name: Gauntlet of Fire
episodes.overview: In order to save his friends, Spike is forced to compete in a perilous Gauntlet for the title of Dragon Lord.

episodes.name: No Second Prances
episodes.overview: When Starlight Glimmer starts becoming friends with a fellow formerly-bad pony.  Twilight tries to stop her.

episodes.name: Newbie Dash
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash finally achieves her dream of becoming a Wonderbolt, but makes a disastrous first impression with the team and gets saddled with a mortifying nickname she is determined to change.

episodes.name: A Hearth's Warming Tail
episodes.overview: It's Hearth's Warming Eve and everypony is excited. Everypony except for Starlight Glimmer. Twilight decides that to cure Starlight of her holiday blues, she will read her one of her favorite Hearth's Warming Eve stories, "A Hearth's Warming Tale."

episodes.name: The Saddle Row Review
episodes.overview: When Rarity opens her flagship store in Manehattan, a tell-all article threatens to expose how badly her friends almost ruined the Grand Opening.

episodes.name: Applejack's 'Day' Off
episodes.overview: While Rarity struggles to get Applejack to relax at the spa, Twilight and Spike find covering her "simple" farm chores to be a more difficult job than they thought.

episodes.name: Flutter Brutter
episodes.overview: When Fluttershy's self-absorbed brother starts freeloading off their parents, she encourages him to move out, but he moves in with her instead, forcing Fluttershy to stand up to her brother and help him get over his fear of failure.

episodes.name: Spice Up Your Life
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie and Rarity are called to Canterlot to solve a friendship problem. Once there, they discover a father and daughter whose relationship is strained as they struggle to keep their restaurant open. Pinkie Pie and Rarity both want to help, but have different ideas on what “help” means.

guest_stars.character: Saffron Masala / Sweet Biscuit / Canterlot Pony 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Diana Kaarina

guest_stars.character: Saffron Masala / Sweet Biscuit / Canterlot Pony 2 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Lee Tockar

episodes.name: Stranger than Fan Fiction
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash attends the Daring Do Convention in Manehattan and meets a pony named Quibble  Pants who despises Daring Do as much as she loves it. The two of them  get wrapped up in a real life Daring Do adventure and must settle their differences if they have any  chance of surviving the convention.

episodes.name: The Cart Before the Ponies
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are excited for the chance to race in the annual Applewood Derby until their teammates Rarity, Applejack and Rainbow Dash take over the competition

episodes.name: 28 Pranks Later
episodes.overview: When Rainbow Dash's pranking gets out of hand, the ponies decide to give her a taste of her own medicine  zom-pony style!

episodes.name: The Times They Are a Changeling
episodes.overview: When Spike travels with Twilight and Sunburst back to the Crystal Empire to visit Flurry Heart, they discover the entire empire in a panic due to the reported presence of Changeling spy.

episodes.name: Dungeons & Discords
episodes.overview: When the Mane 6 leave town, Discord decides to join Spike and Big Mac's top secret Guys' Night; Much to Discord's disappointment, the Guys' Night turns out to be an evening of fantasy role-playing.

episodes.name: Buckball Season
episodes.overview: When Appleloosa challenges Ponyville to a game of buckball, Applejack and Rainbow Dash discover (and must cultivate) their friends' unrealized potential.

episodes.name: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks
episodes.overview: The Crusaders encounter a problem that might be impossible for them to solve when an enthusiastic young griffin asks them to help her get a Cutie Mark of her own.

episodes.name: Viva Las Pegasus
episodes.overview: The Map sends Applejack and Fluttershy to Las Pegasus where they find Film and Flam working in a resort called Gladmane's, where suspicious dealings are going on.

episodes.name: Every Little Thing She Does
episodes.overview: Although Starlight Glimmer is excelling at her magical studies with Twilight Sparkle, she has been avoiding her friendship lessons. Feeling pressure to impress her teacher, Starlight attempts to tackle several friendship problems at once, with questionable results.

episodes.name: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)
episodes.overview: When Applejack, Rarity and Pinkie Pie all return from a boat trip angry at each other, Twilight, after hearing three very different versions of the events, must discern the truth to save their friendships.

episodes.name: Where the Apple Lies
episodes.overview: When Apple Bloom tells a white lie to cover up a mistake, Applejack shares the story of how she came to value honesty after telling a series of lies that almost destroyed the farm and landed the whole Apple family in the hospital.

episodes.name: Top Bolt
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash and Twilight Sparkle are sent to the Wonderbolt Academy to help two friends, Vapor Trail and Sky Stinger, solve a friendship problem that could prevent them from getting into the Academy.

episodes.name: To Where and Back Again (1)
episodes.overview: Without the help of Twilight Sparkle and the Mane Six, Starlight Glimmer assembles an unlikely team of heroes to defend Equestria from the return of one of its greatest threats.

episodes.name: To Where and Back Again (2)
episodes.overview: Starlight Glimmer leads an unlikely squad of rescuers against one of the ponies' oldest and greatest foes in order to save her friends and Equestria.

episodes.name: Celestial Advice
episodes.overview: When Twilight Sparkle agonizes over Starlight Glimmer's future, she gets some advice from her very own mentor -­ Princess Celestia.

episodes.name: All Bottled Up
episodes.overview: While the Mane 6 are on a friendship retreat, Starlight Glimmer and Trixie lose Twilight's friendship map. Afraid her anger might get out of control, Starlight does a spell to contain it while they search for it.

episodes.name: A Flurry of Emotions
episodes.overview: After planning a jam-­ packed day, Twilight Sparkle also says yes to babysitting her niece, Flurry Heart. But with Flurry along for the ride, Twilight struggles to maintain her rep as "The Best Aunt Ever" while keeping Flurry out of trouble!

episodes.name: Rock Solid Friendship
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie learns that Maud might move to Ponyville, she does everything she can to make sure her sister sees that it has more to offer than just rocks.

episodes.name: Fluttershy Leans In
episodes.overview: Fluttershy is determined to make her career dreams come true with the help of some very special ponies. But when Fluttershy's vision is not being executed properly, she must find a way to stand up and fight for her ideas.

episodes.name: Forever Filly
episodes.overview: When Rarity surprises Sweetie Belle with a day together filled with all of her favorite activities, Rarity quickly learns that her little sister is no longer the little foal she used to be.

episodes.name: Parental Glideance
episodes.overview: When Rainbow Dash's parents discover she's a Wonderbolt, they show up at every event to cheer her on. But their unabashed enthusiasm is embarrassing and pushes Rainbow Dash to the brink.

episodes.name: Hard to Say Anything
episodes.overview: When the CMC's figure out that Big Mac has his first crush, they vow to help him win Sugar Belle's heart against the competition of Feather Bangs.

episodes.name: Honest Apple
episodes.overview: When Rarity asks Applejack to be a judge in a fashion show, Applejack learns that an opinion, however honest, can still be hurtful.

episodes.name: A Royal Problem
episodes.overview: Starlight Glimmer is sent to solve a friendship problem between Princess Celestia and Princess Luna; when it's clear that the problem is that the royal sisters don't appreciate one another, Starlight impulsively switches their cutie marks!

episodes.name: Not Asking for Trouble
episodes.overview: Pinkie heads to Yakyakistan to attend a festival, but when she tries to get help after Yakyakistan gets covered in snow the yaks refuse.

episodes.name: Discordant Harmony
episodes.overview: When Discord invites Fluttershy to his realm for tea, he worries she won't be comfortable there and begins to change it and himself with disastrous results.

episodes.name: The Perfect Pear
episodes.overview: Applejack and her siblings discover a few surprises when they set out to unravel the mystery of the feud between the Apple and Pear families.

episodes.name: Fame and Misfortune
episodes.overview: Ponies begin to argue over who wrote the best lesson after Twilight publishes her friendship journal.

episodes.name: Triple Threat
episodes.overview: Fearing that they may not get along, Spike does everything he can to prevent Ember and Thorax from meeting each other after he accidentally invites them both to Ponyville.

episodes.name: Campfire Tales
episodes.overview: When their sister camping trip is ruined by Fly-ders, Applejack, Rarity, and Rainbow Dash tell Sweetie Belle, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo the stories of their favorite legends; inspired by the tales, the girls make the most out of their new situation.

episodes.name: To Change A Changeling
episodes.overview: Starlight Glimmer and Trixie try to get Thorax's brother Pharynx to accept the new way by sharing love and transforming so he doesn't undermine Thorax's leadership, and that the hive will ultimately accept him.

episodes.name: Daring Done?
episodes.overview: When Rainbow Dash’s favorite author, A.K. Yearling, announces her retirement, she convinces Pinkie Pie to go on a quest to find out if the Daring Do book series will be closed forever.

guest_stars.character: Daring Do / A.K. Yearling / Random Villager (voice)
guest_stars.name: Chiara Zanni

episodes.name: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You
episodes.overview: When Rarity's shampoo is accidentally switched with Zecora's magical remover potion, she does everything she can to fix her devastated mane in time for an upcoming photo shoot.

episodes.name: A Health of Information
episodes.overview: While helping Fluttershy gather supplies, Zecora comes down with a terrible disease called Swamp Fever; even though a cure has not been discovered, Fluttershy makes it her mission to heal Zecora no matter what it takes.

episodes.name: Marks and Recreation
episodes.overview: Wanting to help as many blank flanks as possible, the Cutie Mark Crusaders start a Cutie Mark Day Camp, but are surprised when one of their campers doesn’t want a cutie mark!

episodes.name: Once Upon a Zeppelin
episodes.overview: Twilight is torn when she discovers the cruise she and her family are on is a themed vacation experience in which ponies have paid for the privilege of spending time with her, and she must please both her family and the cruise attendees.

episodes.name: Secrets and Pies
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie thinks she sees Rainbow Dash throw away one of her pies, she suspects the worst - that Rainbow Dash secretly hates her pies; Pinkie Pie attempts to catch Rainbow Dash in her web of lies.

episodes.name: Uncommon Bond
episodes.overview: When Starlight gets a visit from Sunburst, she discovers that he has tons in common with her friends and starts to wonder if he still has anything in common with her.

episodes.name: Shadow Play (1)
episodes.overview: When Sunburst discovers the lost journal of Starswirl the Bearded, Twilight becomes obsessed with saving her magical idol from a thousand-year-old prison.

episodes.name: Shadow Play (2)
episodes.overview: With Starswirl and the other Pillars of Old Equestria back from limbo (where they’ve been trapped for a thousand years), Twilight and her friends must work together to defeat the Pony of Shadows.

episodes.name: School Daze (1)
episodes.overview: When the Friendship Map grows bigger to reflect the world beyond Equestria, the Mane Six realize they'll need a way to spread the message of friendship far and wide. Luckily, Twilight knows just what to do - open a School of Friendship.

episodes.name: School Daze (2)
episodes.overview: Twilight must reunite her students to stand up for what's right when the Friendship School gets closed by the EEA.

episodes.name: The Maud Couple
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie's super-best-friend-sister bond is challenged when Maud gets a boyfriend that Pinkie can't stand.

episodes.name: Fake It 'Til You Make It
episodes.overview: Fluttershy vows to look after Rarity's Manehattan boutique while she's away and takes on a series of characters in order to cope with the intimidating clientele.

episodes.name: Grannies Gone Wild
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash agrees to accompany Granny Smith and a group of elder ponies to Las Pegasus so she can ride a roller coaster before it closes.

episodes.name: Surf and/or Turf
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are called by the Cutie Map to Mount Aris to help a Hippogriff find where he belongs - either with his seapony or Hippogriff relatives.

episodes.name: Horse-Play
episodes.overview: Princess Celestia's dream of being in a play is fulfilled when Twilight casts her in one, but realizes that her talents lie elsewhere.

episodes.name: The Parent Map
episodes.overview: When Starlight Glimmer and Sunburst are called by the Cutie Map to visit their old hometown, they discover that their parents are having a friendship problem.

episodes.name: Non-Compete Clause
episodes.overview: Applejack and Rainbow Dash compete with each other to see who gets to be Teacher of the Month.

episodes.name: The Break Up Breakdown
episodes.overview: When Big Mac overhears Sugar Belle talking to Mrs. Cake, he starts to believe that Sugar Belle is going to break up with him.

episodes.name: Molt Down
episodes.overview: Spike goes through a process that dragons suffer from that might kick him out of the house.

episodes.name: Marks for Effort
episodes.overview: The Cutie Mark Crusaders try many attempts to attend Twilight's School of Friendship, despite making it clear that they've already mastered the curriculum.

episodes.name: The Mean 6
episodes.overview: When the ponies decide to go on a camping trip, Queen Chrysalis creates evil clones of the Mane 6 to help her steal the Elements of Harmony so she can use their power to get revenge on Starlight.

episodes.name: A Matter of Principals
episodes.overview: When Twilight leaves Starlight in charge of the School of Friendship, Discord is frustrated that he wasn't asked, so he does what he can to make Starlight's new role impossible.

episodes.name: The Hearth’s Warming Club
episodes.overview: Preparations for Hearth's Warming Eve are ruined, and while Twilight tries to figure out who's behind it, the students bond over shared memories of their home.

episodes.name: Friendship University
episodes.overview: When Twilight discovers there's another school of friendship, she and Rarity go to investigate and are shocked to discover that Twilight's idol and Pillar of Old Equestria, Starswirl the Bearded, is enrolled at Friendship U.

episodes.name: The End in Friend
episodes.overview: Rarity and Rainbow Dash begin to question why they are friends when they can't find anything they both like to do together.

episodes.name: Yakity-Sax
episodes.overview: Pinkie Pie has a new hobby that she absolutely loves - playing the Zenithrash. But when her friends discourage her from playing due to her lack of skill, it causes a series of events leading to Pinkie Pie possibly leaving Ponyville forever!

episodes.name: Road to Friendship
episodes.overview: When Trixie is invited to bring her magic show to the far off land of Saddle Arabia, she can think of nopony better to bring along than her great and powerful assistant, Starlight-but, not all friends are meant to travel together.

episodes.name: The Washouts
episodes.overview: When Scootaloo becomes enamored with The Washouts, a touring group of stunt ponies, Rainbow Dash is concerned for her safety and worries that Scoot's day as her number one fan are over.

episodes.name: A Rockhoof and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: When Rockhoof, heroic Pillar of the past, is having trouble fitting into the modern world, Twilight and her friends strive to help him find a new purpose.

episodes.name: What Lies Beneath
episodes.overview: The students of Twilight's School of Friendship are cramming for "History of Magic in Equestria" exam in the school library when they discover a part of the school that no pony else knows about. When they decide to do some exploring they end up learning much more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Sounds of Silence
episodes.overview: Fluttershy and Applejack journey to the edge of the map on a Friendship Quest to help a group of ponies named Kirin -- who are so afraid of hurting each other's feelings, they've taken a potion of silence.

episodes.name: Father Knows Beast
episodes.overview: When a strange dragon crash lands in Ponyville claiming to be Spike's father, Spike is ready to do anything his "dad" says in order to learn how a to be a "real" dragon.

episodes.name: School Raze (1)
episodes.overview: When the magic of Equestria mysteriously begins to fail, Twilight leads her friends on a quest for answers, leaving the School of Friendship open to attack from a dangerous mastermind.

episodes.name: School Raze (2)
episodes.overview: While Twilight and the rest of the Mane Six try to escape Tarturus, Cozy Glow furthers her plot to take over the School of Friendship with only Twilight's students and the CMCs to stop her!

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End (1)
episodes.overview: Princess Celestia and Princess Luna decide to retire and hand off the ruling of Equestria to Twilight Sparkle and her friends, which sends Twilight into a tailspin of self-doubt. Meanwhile, an ancient villain bands together a legion of nefarious characters to conquer all of Equestria, challenging Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Mane 6 to step in and save the day.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End (2)
episodes.overview: As Twilight and the rest of the Mane six struggle to come to terms with the destruction of the Tree and Elements of Harmony, King Sombra sets his sights on conquering all of Equestria.

episodes.name: Uprooted
episodes.overview: The Young Six respond to a magical summons from the Tree of Harmony, only to learn it has been destroyed.

episodes.name: Sparkle's Seven
episodes.overview: Twilight and Shining Armor pit their wits against each other to settle a long-standing sibling rivalry, but they soon discover they are not the only competitors.

episodes.name: The Point of No Return
episodes.overview: Twilight realizes she never returned a book to the Canterlot Library and may have caused her favorite librarian to lose her job.

episodes.name: Common Ground
episodes.overview: Rainbow Dash's old pal Quibble Pants needs help to bond with the daughter of his new special friend because, like Dash, she's a real sports pony.

episodes.name: She's All Yak
episodes.overview: When Sandbar asks Yona to a pony dance, she goes to Rarity and her friends for a makeover in appearance and personality.

episodes.name: Frenemies
episodes.overview: Grogar sends his legion of doom on a mission to become allies, but his plan works too well and they almost become friends.

episodes.name: Sweet and Smoky
episodes.overview: Smolder returns to the Dragonlands with Spike and Fluttershy to help cheer up her sensitive brother, but when they arrive they discover the dragon eggs aren't hatching.

episodes.name: Going to Seed
episodes.overview: Apple Bloom's obsession with catching a magical creature causes Applejack's plan for a harvest to go awry.

episodes.name: Student Counsel
episodes.overview: Starlight Glimmer relishes her role as school counselor and encourages the students to come to her anytime about anything, but she becomes overwhelmed and learns a lesson.

episodes.name: The Last Crusade
episodes.overview: Unexpected visitors to Ponyville threaten to break up the Cutie Mark Crusaders forever.

episodes.name: Between Dark and Dawn
episodes.overview: Luna and Celestia take a sister vacation while Twilight and her friends struggle to cover the princesses' many royal duties.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh
episodes.overview: When Pinkie Pie needs to find her life's purpose, she seeks out her old friend Cheese Sandwich, however she soon discovers that the unimaginable has happened.

episodes.name: 2, 4, 6, Greaaat
episodes.overview: The School of Friendship is starting a buckball team, and Rainbow Dash has to come to terms with the fact that she won't be coaching the team.

episodes.name: A Trivial Pursuit
episodes.overview: Twilight's hopes of keeping her Trivia Trot winning streak alive are waylaid when she's unexpectedly paired up with Pinkie Pie, who has never been to a trivia night before.

episodes.name: The Summer Sun Setback
episodes.overview: Twilight is determined to make Celestia and Luna's last Summer Sun Celebration memorable, but things start going horribly wrong.

episodes.name: She Talks to Angel
episodes.overview: When Fluttershy and Angel Bunny's relationship hits the skids, Zecora gives them a potion to help them understand each other.

episodes.name: Dragon Dropped
episodes.overview: Rarity slowly starts to grow jealous when Spike starts to spend more time with Gabby rather then her.

episodes.name: A Horse Shoe-In
episodes.overview: When Starlight is told that she will run the School of Friendship after Twilight becomes the ruler of Equestria, she must choose a Vice Mare, putting her friendship with Trixie to the test.

episodes.name: Daring Doubt
episodes.overview: When a previously unheard-of author writes a novel trashing Daring Do, exposing her as a real pony, and praising Dr. Caballeron, Rainbow Dash rushes to defend her friend, while Fluttershy is more sympathetic to the "misunderstood" Caballeron.

episodes.name: Growing Up is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: When the Cutie Mark Crusaders are magically transformed into grown ups, they discover that growing up the right way means gaining experience and wisdom that simply can't be rushed.

episodes.name: The Big Mac Question
episodes.overview: When Big Mac and Sugar Belle decide to propose to each other, everything their friends do to help ends up making a mess of the whole thing.

episodes.name: The Ending of the End (1)
episodes.overview: A villainous alliance unleashes their power on Equestria.

episodes.name: The Ending of the End (2)
episodes.overview: The Mane Six face off against Equestria's most dangerous foes.

episodes.name: The Last Problem
episodes.overview: Twilight Sparkle and friends tell a story about how Twilight had to make a difficult decision when Celestia and Luna retire and hand the throne to Twilight who must choose to either be the rightful ruler of Equestria or stay in Ponyville with her friends.
